ComicInfo.Summary:
Black Panther and Shuri faced a deadly swarm of mosquitos in the depths of the Wakandan jungle. Now they must race home to defend their country from the mastermind behind the recent unnatural natural disasters.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Juan Samu (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 1 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Michael Avon Oeming | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 23:20:17. [CVDB721086] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:09:31. [Issue ID 2020976]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: David Garcia Cruz,Juan Samu,Michael Avon Oeming
ComicInfo.Editor: Anni Perheentupa,Chase Marotz,Denton J. Tipton,Elizabeth Brei
ComicInfo.Characters: Queen Mother,Black Panther,Okoye,Captain H'Rham,Shuri,King Cadaver,Captain Ashei
